title: Border, 1550–1600
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: withdrawn element work with needle lace, bobbin lace edging
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: A row of intertwining hexagons enclose alternating male and female figures. Geometric edging on three sides.
